title: Cigar Mistakes - The After Show
itunes:title: Cigar Mistakes - The After Show
description:
This week, Cigar Coop joins us on The After Show to talk about cigar mistakes. Dave has an interesting story about a woman who ordered a box of cigars and received something unexpected. It doesn’t just happen to consumers. Dave has another story about a cigar mistake affecting a retailer.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
